test.name: [2.1.1] Upload csv dataset - comma separated

kw.name: Given dataset upload page is opened
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the active browser instance to the provided URL.

kw.name: Choose File
kw.doc: Inputs the `file_path` into file input field found by `locator`.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Select From List By Value
kw.doc: Selects `*values` from list identified by `locator`

kw.name: Focus
kw.doc: Sets focus to element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Then dataset field count should be "${TitanicDatasetFieldCount}"
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Xpath Should Match X Times
kw.doc: Verifies that the page contains the given number of elements located by the given `xpath`.

kw.name: And dataset field headers should contain following fields
Table Header Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that the table header, i.e. any <th>...</th> element, contains `expected`.

kw.name: Table Header Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that the table header, i.e. any <th>...</th> element, contains `expected`.
